amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities, Counties, And Other Political Subdivisions
amendatorysection.catchline: Definition of certain solid wastes; council; adopt rules and regulations.
amendatorysection.para: The council shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations which define lead-acid batteries, discarded household appliances, waste oil, and unregulated hazardous wastes, except household hazardous wastes, which are exempt from the regulations under the Environmental Protection Act.
